pages.title: Blazunia
pages.text: The $(c:/create ponder creatania:blazunia @a)Blazunia$(/c) is a powerful magical firey flower.

pages.title: Corrupt Mana Block
pages.text: This purplish block consists of $(l:creatania:machines#manacondenser)condensed$(/l) Mana, though it seems corrupted and inert. Should be handled with extreme caution.
The Mana Casing is a foundational building block for Creatania's $(l:creatania:machines#manacondenser)machines$(/l).

pages.title: Pure Mana Block
pages.text: The Pure Mana block is the $(l:creatania:mana_su#purifying)purified$(/l) version of the Corrupt Mana block. It too is inert but seems quite safe to handle.

pages.title: Real Mana Block
pages.text: The Real Mana block contains all of the magical properties of Botania Mana but in block form. We are finding more and more uses for this block.
